General.Name: Yong Tai Bhd
General.Description: Yong Tai Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the tourism-related property development business in Malaysia. It develops residential and commercial properties; and invests in properties. The company also engages in the provision of asset and facilities management business, which include consultancy, mall management, project management, and corporate office management; hospitality and tourism business, such as hotel and accommodation, and food and beverages. In addition, it offers land acquisition, concept design, permit approval, architecture planning, stie construction, and sales and marketing services, as well as assisted living, wellness, education, and international terminal cruise. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Melaka, Malaysia.
